targets.expr:
topk_avg($top,
    sum(vmware_vm_net_bytesRx_average{vcenter=~"$vcenter", pfinstance!~"^vmnic.*|^vusb.*"}) by (vm) * on (vm) group_left
    vmware_vm_info{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo"} * 8192,
    "Others"
)

topk_avg($top,
    sum(vmware_vm_net_bytesTx_average{vcenter=~"$vcenter", pfinstance!~"^vmnic.*|^vusb.*"}) by (vm) * on (vm) group_left
    vmware_vm_info{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo"} * 8192,
    "Others"
)

vmware_host_cpu_corecount{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo"} * on (hostmo) group_left 
vmware_host_info{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo", host=~"$host"}

vmware_host_cpu_capacity{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo"} * on (hostmo) group_left 
vmware_host_info{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo", host=~"$host"} * 1000 * 1000

vmware_host_mem_capacity{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo"} * on (hostmo) group_left 
vmware_host_info{vcenter=~"$vcenter", hostmo=~"$hostmo", host=~"$host"}
